####  Information for healthcare providers 
#### Tools
**CHA2DS2-VASc Score  
** Estimates stroke risk in patients with atrial fibrillation. Use online calculator [www.chadsvasc.org(external link)](https://www.chadsvasc.org/ "Open external link")
**HAS-BLED Score for major bleeding risk  
** Estimates risk of major bleeding for patients on anticoagulation to assess risk-benefit in atrial fibrillation care. Use the online calculator from [MD Calc website(external link)](https://www.mdcalc.com/has-bled-score-major-bleeding-risk "Open external link").
**AF Electronic Decision Support Tool BPAC  
**[The AF decision support(external link)](https://bpac.org.nz/b-safe/ "Open external link") is quick to use, providing an individualised check list for anticoagulation, steps to reduce bleeding risk, and advice on heart rate control and overall cardiovascular risk management.**  
**
